reviewText: It's okay but there isn't a lot of action because there is a lack of interviews and they show a lot of the same shots so many times. It almost made me fall asleep.

Both my younger sons are into construction trucks and watch this video  constantly. I'm continuely rewinding the video and starting it over. I've  played it so much I'm starting to know the tape myself word for word. A  must have for any parent with kids into construction trucks.
